juding_criteria:
Based on the Key Requirement ("The image must be the result of accurately modifying the conditional image according to the instruction") and the specific prompt ("Replace the white keyboard with a black mechanical keyboard"), the following visual elements must be present in the final image:

*   Wooden desk in the foreground
*   Apple iMac monitor on the foreground desk
*   Plastic water bottle with a pink cap
*   Pink cylindrical pen holder with pens/pencils
*   Small potted cactus in a light-colored pot
*   Small potted plant with a pink bow decoration in a light-colored pot
*   Wooden paper tray containing white paper
*   Silver laptop to the right of the keyboard area
*   Adjustable silver desk lamp clamped to the right side of the desk
*   Out-of-focus green plant leaves in the immediate foreground left
*   Background wooden desk
*   Background computer monitor
*   Black office chair in the background
*   Partially visible person sitting at the background desk
*   Large, bright windows in the background
*   Multiple small potted plants on the background windowsill
*   Black mechanical keyboard (located where the original white keyboard was, in front of the iMac)
